customer_name: Natural History Museum Of The Adirondacks

citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
citations.narrative:
The expiration dates on the following medications indicated that they were outdated:
- Vitamin B Complex injectable 250ml; 12/15
- Bottle of BeneBac probiotic; May 2015
- one bottle of Lactulose; June 15
The use of outdated medications cannot be considered appropriate therapy.
The above medications were discarded immediately. Additionally the non-compliance is to be corrected in the
future by the routine inspection of all medications at the facility.
An exit interview was conducted with the facility representative.

narrative:
2.40(b)(2)
ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
The expiration dates on the following medications indicated that they were outdated:
     - Vitamin B Complex injectable 250ml;  12/15
     - Bottle of BeneBac probiotic;  May 2015
     - one bottle of Lactulose;  June 15
The use of outdated medications cannot be considered appropriate therapy.
The above medications were discarded immediately.  Additionally the non-compliance is to be corrected in the
future by the routine inspection of all medications at the facility.
An exit interview was conducted with the facility representative.
